scripts.postinstall: echo Installation complete. Run 'npm run build:all' to build for all platforms.
scripts.copy:ui: copyfiles -u 3 src/web/ui/**/* dist/web/ui/ && copyfiles package.json dist/
scripts.list-dist: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function listDir(dir,prefix=''){const items=fs.readdirSync(dir);items.forEach(item=>{const fullPath=path.join(dir,item);const stat=fs.statSync(fullPath);if(stat.isDirectory()){console.log(prefix+'ðŸ“ '+item+'/');listDir(fullPath,prefix+'  ');}else{console.log(prefix+'ðŸ“„ '+item+' ('+stat.size+' bytes)');}});}console.log('ðŸ“‚ dist/');listDir('dist');"
scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p build 2>/dev/null || mkdir build 2>nul || echo Build directory exists
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:tsc && npm run copy:ui && npm run list-dist
scripts.build:windows: npm run build && npm run pkg:windows
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && npm run pkg:linux
scripts.build:macos: npm run build && npm run pkg:macos
scripts.build:macos-arm64: npm run build && npm run pkg:macos-arm64
scripts.pkg:macos-arm64: pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output build/IdleCI-macos-arm64 || echo 'ARM64 build completed (post-build error ignored)'
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run pkg:windows && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos && npm run pkg:macos-arm64 || echo 'All builds completed'
scripts.build:all:no-arm64: npm run build && npm run pkg:windows && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos
scripts.build:all:parallel: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel pkg:windows pkg:linux pkg:macos pkg:macos-arm64
scripts.build:all:parallel:fallback: npm run build && npm run pkg:windows && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos && npm run pkg:macos-arm64
